resources.string: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?

This quiz consists of questions carefully designed to assess your comprehension of several trivia topics, such as pop culture, history, and sports. Each question is of format multiple-choice. Read each question carefully and select the response that best answers that question. One correctly answered question scores you $50, and every subsequently correctly answered question doubles the score. Answer 16 questions correct and you\'ll be a millionaire! But answer one question incorrectly and the game is over!
